title: Cozy two bedroom unit in Mount Roskill
description: This cozy two bedroom unit is located in a sought-after and convenient location of Mount Roskill. Set well off the main road in an elevated position, the unit is bright and warm with a spacious living area and a newly renovated kitchen. A heatpump has already been installed in the living area. Two good size bedrooms filled in with natural light throughout different times of the day. The interior of the property is freshly painted. The front deck with a nice view has also been painted providing an excellent outdoor entertaining area. The back door in the kitchen area leads to the backyard. The unit comes with a single garage and a laundry area down below. This lovely unit is conveniently located close to dominion road, short walking distance to schools, local shops, supermarket, parks and public transport. In zoned for MT ROSKILL INTERMEDIATE (0.6 km), MT ROSKILL PRIMARY SCHOOL(0.4 km) and MT ROSKILL GRAMMAR(0.5 km). *No Pets / No Smokers *Lawn mowing included Move in costs: 4 weeks rent as bond, 1st weeks rent Look forward to meeting you at this lovely unit! Please contact Rachel to view now!
